snippet: With a proliferation of new cafes, four-star hotels and boutiques, not to mention a worldly set of residents, the diverse Moroccan city is poised to become a major resort destination.
abstract: With a proliferation of new cafes, four-star hotels and boutiques, not to mention a worldly set of residents, the diverse Moroccan city is poised to become a major resort destination.

headline.main: The Modern-Day Melting Pot of Tangier
